I’m happy to share that I’m starting a new position as Chief Revenue Officer (CRO) - PARTNER at FinnlySport!
One of my favorite weeks of the year!

Last night was a truly special moment for me as a proud dad! My little one had his pre-school graduation and during the event, they had a slideshow where the children shared their aspirations for the future. It warmed my heart to see that my son wants to make a difference in the world, just like we are striving to do at FinnlySport, our tech startup. Witnessing his appreciation for our hard work made everything we do at FinnlySport feel worthwhile. Moments like these make us realize that we are all working to make the world a better place, one step at a time.

As professionals, we strive for excellence in our respective fields. And when we encounter great products or services, it's only natural to appreciate them. That's why I firmly believe in promoting positivity and avoiding negative comments about our competitors. After all, our focus should always be on delivering the best possible experience for our customers. Let's continue to build each other up and push ourselves to be the best we can be.
Amazing opportunity to work with an amazing company!  These guys are the best!!  CHECK THEM OUT!

*I PASSED*
One thing I truly believe in is always continuing to learn new things.  In the last eight months, I have stepped outside my comfort zone by starting a new company FinnlySport with my excellent partners, and while doing so, we all are wearing many hats.  Marketing has always interested me, and now I can be more well-rounded in this subject. 

I have been part of Pavilion for a few years now, and they offer many exceptional programs, including CMO and CRO certification programs (which I have completed).   If you have ever thought about joining Pavillion or have questions, please let me know! #pavillonuniversity #alwaysbelearning #salesleadership

As many of you know, I have spent the last 3+ years working at Upserve/Lightspeed Commerce.  That opportunity has given me the chance to work with some outstanding people and significantly enhance my skills. 

After much soul searching, I have decided that it is time to move on to the next challenge in my career.  I talked to some very notable companies but have realized that I am ready for a different path.  

Prior to my last role, I spent over 11 years selling software to the sports and recreation industry.  I truly enjoyed working with the people in that industry.  Therefore, I am very excited to announce that I have decided to join forces with some former colleagues to launch a new company; FinnlyTech.  Our goal is to be the leader in facility management software (again)!  Between the company's four principals, we have over 70 years of experience in providing market-leading technology to the recreation industry. 
  
I look forward to this exciting new venture! 
https://lnkd.in/gAdCYhpf 

#startup #entrepreneurship #saas #sportsindustry #sportssoftware #hockey
